## Installation

### `Julia`

To install `Julia` download the latest version from [here](https://julialang.org/downloads).

### `VSCode`

- `VSCode` can be installed at [this link](https://code.visualstudio.com/).

- The extension `Julia` can also be installed directly from `VSCode`.

## Reference textbooks

The course is based on two books:

- [*An Introduction to Numerical Analysis*](https://www.cambridge.org/fr/universitypress/subjects/mathematics/numerical-analysis/introduction-numerical-analysis-1?format=AR&isbn=9780521007948gt), by Süli and Mayers.

- [*Numerical Mathematics*](https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-0-387-22750-4), by Quarteroni.
